data.name: BlackBox
data.detailed_description:
A game where you play as an air crash investigator

BlackBox is about an air crash investigator in the 90s, you are seated at your office desk where you go through files, search the database by typing relevant keywords and listen to the cockpit voice recordings to gather data to find out what happened.

How does it work?

1. Listen to clips of recordings from the black-box/CVR (Cockpit voice recorder)
2. Search the database for any information that might help you solve the case
3. Connect the dots and piece together the story.
data.about_the_game:
A game where you play as an air crash investigator

BlackBox is about an air crash investigator in the 90s, you are seated at your office desk where you go through files, search the database by typing relevant keywords and listen to the cockpit voice recordings to gather data to find out what happened.

How does it work?

1. Listen to clips of recordings from the black-box/CVR (Cockpit voice recorder)

3. Connect the dots and piece together the story.
data.short_description: A plane has crashed in the Indian Ocean, search the database and listen to the Cockpit voice recordings to uncover what happened. Blackbox is a 'Her story' inspired detective game, where you investigate an aeroplane crash. The devil is in the details.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
